review: Works very well - it is really fast. Also works great as a portable, so when I take it to my dad's on weekend trips, the kids have something to watch. As of yet, I have not used any of the game apps, so can't comment on that aspect of the Fire. The only reasons it doesn't rate 5-stars are 1) It doesn't stream pictures from my laptop (only from the Amazon cloud), and 2) the wonderful voice search only works for Amazon products - I would so love to use it when in another app. Basically, if you use Amazon Prime a lot, this is great.
